text: Stankova () is a village in the north of Kalush Raion, Ivano-Frankivsk Oblast, on the border of Zhydachiv Raion, Lviv Oblast. The population of the village is 1,266 persons Село Станькова: карта вулиць and Local government is administered by Stankovaska village council.Станьківська сільська рада To the village council Stankova belongs Vylky village. == Geography == This village is located on the altitude of above sea level, its total area is 17,35 km2. The village is located away from the central of roads at a distance from the regional center Ivano-Frankivsk , from the district center Kalush, and from Lviv. == History and Attractions == The first written mention of the village belongs to 1158. The village has two churches: 1\. Of the Archangel Michael Church (built in 1994). 2\. Church of the Nativity. The wooden church, an architectural monument of local importance (built in 1866).Станькова/Церква Різдва Христового == References == == External links == * Історія села Станкова Калуського району - історичне прикарпаття * weather.in.ua/ Stan'kova (Ivano-Frankivsk region) Category:Villages in Kalush Raion
title: Stankova, Kalush Raion
